title: 3-bed, 2-car garage condo in Chelmsford Village
posting_body: Amazing, clean, well-located 3-bedroom, 2-car garage condo for rent starting on/after August 01, 2022.
Condo is located in Chelmsford Village (255 North Road), right across from McCarthy Middle School.
Access to swimming pool and tennis court.
Walmart, gas station, and grocery stores within 1 mile.
Stainless Steel Appliances
Washer and Dryer in unit!
2 Car garage to keep cars warm in winter!
2 swimming pools for summer, club house and 3 tennis courts!
Brazilian Cherry Hardwood floors in Living and dining
Hardwood in bedrooms.
Working wood fireplace in Living room.
Eat-in kitchen with sky light, gas stove and new appliances.
Central A/C and gas Heat.
Big deck for outdoor seating
Additional room next to garage for family room, 4th Bed room or office.
Storage and Washer dryer room in basement.
Close to Route 3 and 495, shopping.
Big Deck
Walking trail.
Snow removal and landscaping included in rent.
Walking distance from Chelmsford schools
Very Safe neighborhood
Finished basement with carpet floor - can be used as an extra bedroom!!
Rent $3500/month (negotiable).
1-year lease preferable and open for extension.
